item.title: Dow Futures Edge Lower With Wall Street Heading For Worst Week In Over A Month: TSLA, EXPE, ABNB, OPEN Among Stocks To Watch
item.description: While Dow Jones futures edged lower by 0.05% at the time of writing, the S&P 500 futures declined 0.06%.

item.title: DraftKings Stock Drops Premarket On Lower Revenue Forecast: CEO Downplays Threat From Prediction Markets
item.description: CEO Jason Robins says prediction markets and sports betting are very different offerings, and, as such, not a competitive challenge for DraftKings.

item.title: Monster Beverage Stock Rises Premarket On Q3 Beat After Celsius’ Rout
item.description: CEO Hilton Schlosberg said the energy drinks category is strong worldwide.

item.title: Intel Stock Rises Nearly 2% Premarket After Musk Teases Possible Chip Partnership
item.description: The chipmaker’s stock is on track to add to its stellar gains this year after Musk hinted at tapping Intel as a supplier.

item.title: Peloton Stock Jumps Premarket On Bullish Holiday Quarter Outlook
item.description: Peloton also beat expectations for revenue and profit for the last quarter.
